name: Leanometry
tagline: We take ideas to market in 30 days
description:
Leanometry is a digital agency based in Santa Monica,CA that designs, develops, and takes ideas to market in 30 days. As seasoned entrepreneurs, we are major advocates of the “Lean Startup” movement popularized by Eric Reis. The idea is simple: build a “minimum viable product” so simple that you can release a first version and gather user feedback before building a single superfluous feature. In other words, launch today, validate tomorrow, and adapt quickly.
We help you bring ideas to life by following a 5 Step Process that is described at http://leanometry.com/process.. Check our work at http://leanometry.com/work, and if you want us to help you contact us at hello@leanometry.com or 888.228.1090.
